email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

We are looking to transport 8500MT of steel coils from Busan to Long Beach on FOB terms. The required laycan is 20-25 October. Could you provide a vessel option and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Blue Ocean Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 95000, LOA 250m. The starting freight quote is USD58 per MT. Laycan is 20-25 October, and the loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD58 seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and any additional charges?

Best,
Liam Carter
Blue Ocean Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Considering our long-standing relationship, I can revise the freight rate to USD55 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD15,000 per day, pro rata. There are no additional charges beyond this. Let me know if this revised offer works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

USD55 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the OCEAN HARMONY with the laycan of 20-25 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best,
Liam Carter
Blue Ocean Cargo

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
Liam Carter
Blue Ocean Cargo
